overview: Brilliant new director B. Skow joins Lanny Barby, in a wonderful comic tale of a $2 dollar bill and all the hands ... and other body parts ... it travels through. Displaying the incredible production value that AVN called "the next big thing in adult," Skow takes on anal in a big way as Lanny opens up for his advanced cameras like never before. It's an explosive marrying of cinematography and sex as B. Skow continues his ascent to the pantheons of great adult directors! Look for this one at awards time ...
title: $2 Bill
